WYSIWYM.transformer
Class GraphTransformer

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.transformer.GraphTransformer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DependencyTreeTransformer, SemanticGraphTransformer
public class GraphTransformer
extends Object

Provides some basic graph transforming functionalities, like adding/removing nodes and edges.

Version:
1.00 2006/11/13, 1.2 March 2008, 1.3 28 May 2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Method Detail

setGraph

public void setGraph(Graph g)
Sets the graph

Parameters:
g - Graph

addEdge

public boolean addEdge(Edge edge,
                       boolean nodesHaveID)
Adds the edge to the semantic graph. Also adds the source and target node, if there are any. If (an equivalent) source and target node is already in the graph, the edge's source/target is set to that node

Parameters:
edge - Edge to be added
nodesHaveID - True if the nodes already have a Sesame ID
Returns:
false if the Graph already contains an edge with this ID

addEdge

public boolean addEdge(Edge edge)
Adds the edge to the semantic graph. Also adds the source and target node, if there are any. If (an equivalent) source and target node is already in the graph, the edge's source/target is set to that node

Parameters:
edge - Edge to be added
Returns:
false if the Graph already contains an edge with this ID

addNode

public boolean addNode(Node node,
                       boolean hasID)
Adds the node to the semantic graph. Usually not necessary as nodes get added automatically with the edges. If the graph already contains a node with this id, this returns false

Parameters:
node - Node to be added
hasID - True if node already has a Sesame ID
Returns:
false if the Graph already contains a node with this ID

addNode

public boolean addNode(Node node)
Adds the node to the semantic graph. Usually not necessary as nodes get added automatically with the edges. If the graph already contains a node with this id, return false.

Parameters:
node - Node to be added
Returns:
false if the Graph already contains a node with this ID

addBranch

public boolean addBranch(Node node)
Adds the node with all its descendants to the semantic graph. If the graph already contains a node with this id, the descendants are not added!

Parameters:
node - Root of branch to be added
Returns:
false if the Graph already contains a node with this ID

addBranch

public boolean addBranch(Node node,
                         boolean ID)
Adds the node with all its descendants to the semantic graph. If the graph already contains a node with this id, the descendants are not added!

Parameters:
node - Root of branch to be added
ID - True if the nodes in the branch already have Sesame ID's.
Returns:
false if the Graph already contains a node with this ID

removeBranch

public boolean removeBranch(Node node)
Removes the node and all its descendants from the graph.

Parameters:
node - Root of branch to remove
Returns:
false if the Graph did not contain this node.

removeNode

public boolean removeNode(Node node)
Removes the given node from the graph, and also all edges associated with it

Parameters:
node - Node to be removed
Returns:
false if the Graph did not contain this node.

replaceNode

                        Node newNode)
                 throws NameAlreadyBoundException
